[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source

|item-number= 8665
|clearance= #5
|container-class= safe
|secondary-class= thaumiel
|secondary-icon= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Aanomaly-class-bar/thaumiel-icon.svg
|disruption-class= dark
|risk-class=notice
]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-8665 is to be contained in a standard plastic box. As for the entities summoned by the anomaly, they are to be locked in a replica of the White House. (Read information below for more context). To pick up the object, tweezers are needed.

**Current Site of the Object:** Site-76

**Description:**

SCP-8665 is a paranormal shield protecting US Standard coins. If a coin is touched, it will summon the US president that it has drawn in it. They cannot be destroyed yet they can be locked, as their shield is extremely strong.

If the coins are touched by any other objects or anomalies that possess the ability to destroy instantly by just touching objects, the shield will cause an energy explosion and afterwards remain intact.

Any president summoned by SCP-8665 has a bad memory and needs to be talked through things so they can fully understand any kind of situations.

The coins are the following:

**==1 Penny==**
**==1 Nickel==**
**==1 Dime==**
**==1 Quarter==**
**==1 Half-Dollar==**

-----

[[include component:image-block
|name=https://i.imgur.com/axckt0J.jpg
|caption=Image of SCP-8665 before containment
|width=100%
|align=left]]

**Discovery Location and Time:** SCP-8665 was found in a hotel room in the Pearl Hotel, South Walton, Florida in June 19, 2024 by a 27-year-old male called Ethan Grant Jackson. He discovered the coins in the room he had been staying for the past 10 hours. (Room 8). Jackson tried to take the coins from the ground, thinking they are just normal coins, but he grabbed the Quarter and observed how George Washington just appeared in front of him, which scared him. But instead of calling 911, he touched the coin again and he saw how George Washington ceased to exist. From that moment, he spent 2 hours trying to destroy the coins with no success at all, until the loud noise made the other guests in the hotel report him. After he explained everything to the hotel personnel and showed evidence of what he was saying, the hotel personnel called 911. Once the authorities arrived, Jackson explained what just happened to him and they contacted the US Government. The US Government informed the SCP Foundation and the Foundation arrived to the place 44 minutes after. The personnel of the hotel was asked to check the cameras past recordings and the hotel guest lists from the past few days to see who was there before Ethan. They did this while the Foundation figured out what the coins could do. The hotel personnel was also asked to check in the guest lists who was in that room before Jackson. And in the guest lists, the only person to be in that room before Jackson, was Rebecca Aldridge Winslow, a 42-year-old female. She was found at her home and the Mobile Task Force took her to Site-76, the same thing was done with Jackson.

[[include component:image-block
|name=https://i.imgur.com/qzAnrP9.jpg
|caption=Pearl Hotel, South Walton, Florida, US.
|width=100%
|align=center]]

**Activity of the Object and Experiments Done:** 

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #1
> 
> **Date:** 06/19/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. James Holloway Carter
> 
> **Interviewee:** Ethan Grant Jackson
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** Jackson was told he'd get $5,000 USD if he shared what he knew with the Foundation, but he was told that just so he could talk without complications. The Foundation spared the trouble of giving him the money.
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Holloway:** Hello, Mr. Jackson, my name is James Holloway but you can call me Dr. Holloway. I would like to ask you a few questions about the coins you found in the hotel. If you give us all the information you can, we'll give you another five thousand dollars. First of all, what do you know about the coins?
> 
> **Jackson:** All I saw was George Washington appearing. He disappeared when I touched the coin again.
> 
> **Holloway:** What about the other coins?
> 
> **Jackson:** Same thing happened. I never thought I would get to see John F. Kennedy with my own eyes.
> 
> **Holloway:** Why were you trying to destroy the coins?
> 
> **Jackson:** Well those coins scared the shit out of me and I did what I thought was the smart thing to do. But get this; 2 hours of trying to destroy those coins and nothing worked. Hell, I even tried to use a saw and the saw ended up more damaged than the coins.
> 
> **Holloway:** What else do you know about these coins?
> 
> **Jackson:** At first, I tried to scrape them with a needle and a blue sparkle came out.
> 
> **Holloway:** Is that everything you can tell us?
> 
> **Jackson:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [FIVE SECONDS LONG SILENCE][[/span]] Y-yeah.
> 
> **Holloway:** ...In that case, I think we're done for today. Agent Crawford, please give Mr. Jackson some amnesia pills and escort him out of the facility.
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

We later figured out that if a president is summoned, then unsummoned, and lastly summoned again. The president will appear with no memories of his last reincarnation.

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #2
> 
> **Date:** 06/19/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. James Holloway Carter
> 
> **Interviewee:** Rebecca Aldridge Winslow
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** Aldridge talked without having to be offered anything.
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Holloway:** Hello Ms. Aldridge. My name is James Holloway but you can call me Dr. Holloway. I would like to ask you a few questions if you don't mind.
> 
> **Aldridge:** Not at all. I would like to know why i'm here if you don't mind answering.
> 
> **Holloway:** It's all about a group of coins you left on the Pearl Hotel. You were staying there three days ago. Do you remember?
> 
> **Aldridge:** I do. I remember dropping a bunch of coins under the bed accidentally. But I didn't pick them back up because at this age it's almost impossible. And I didn't bother the hotel personnel because it was less than a dollar. I still don't understand what that has to do with me being in this government facility.
> 
> **Holloway:** Did you notice anything weird about those coins?
> 
> **Aldridge:** Not at all. I mean, they're just coins.
> 
> **Holloway:** If you don't mind, we'll spare the trouble of sharing the information of why you're here.
> 
> **Aldridge:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [SIGH][[/span]] It's OK. 
> 
> **Holloway:** Perfect. Agent Crawford, please give Ms. Aldridge some amnesia pills and escort her out of the facility.
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

All US Presidents were summoned and brought to different 2.5m Ã— 6m rooms each. Three of the presidents were taken for interviews one at a time later.

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #3
> 
> **Date:** 06/20/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. James Holloway Carter
> 
> **Interviewee:** SCP-8665-1: "Abraham Lincoln"
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** SCP-8665-1 did not want to cooperate at first so he was promised a book called "The Tempest", by Shakespeare. He eventually spoke
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Holloway:** Hello Mr. Lincoln, my name is James Holloway but you can call me Dr. Holloway. I would like to ask you a few questions if you don't mind. We will give you your promised book afterwards.
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** I don't mind. What do you need to know?
> 
> **Holloway:** What is the last thing you remember?
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** I was in Ford's theatre, and then... I heard a loud noise. Then I fell unconscious and woke up in this place.
> 
> **Holloway:** Did you see something when you fell unconscious?
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** Well... I saw a blue light, and then I had a dream about some kind of place with copper everywhere.
> 
> **Holloway:** Okay... so you say you fell unconscious in the Ford theatre, who is the last person you saw?
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** One of the actresses of the play that night; "Our American Cousin".
> 
> **Holloway:** Which actress?
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** Mary Meredith.
> 
> **Holloway:** Did you see any other famous actor anywhere around?
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** Well, yes. It was a theatre after all.
> 
> **Holloway:** I'll just ask you more directly. Did you see John Wilkes Booth anywhere?
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** No... I mean... yes. I did... I remember now.
> 
> **Holloway:** What was he doing?
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** He... shot me... i'm dead. [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [PANICKING][[/span]]
> 
> **Holloway:** ...I think we're done for now, we'll bring you back soon. Agent Smith, please return Mr. Lincoln back to the room we made for him.
> 
> **SCP-8665-1:** Wait, what? What is happeni-
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #4.5
> 
> **Date:** 06/20/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. Emily Rose Kessler
> 
> **Interviewee:** SCP-8665-2: "Thomas Jefferson"
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** SCP-8665-2 did not want to cooperate at first. This happened when talking to Dr. Holloway, so we changed the interviewer to Dr. Emily Rose Kessler.
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Rose:** Hello Mr. Jefferson, I apologize for my partner's manners. As he told you, we just want to ask you a few questions.
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** This is the first time I see a lady working in a place like this.
> 
> **Rose:** Yeah, well... my name is Emily Rose but you can call me Dr. Rose. Can you cooperate with us? I promise my partners here will let you go afterwards.
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** I will talk. It is just weird to see a lady in this kind of environment.
> 
> **Rose:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [WHISPERING][[/span]] I can see why Holloway was loosing it with you. [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [NORMAL TONE][[/span]] What is the last thing you remember?
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** I was... dying... ...am I in heaven?
> 
> **Rose:** Uh- No, this is... uh... well I can't tell you exactly where we are right now. But you are, infact, alive.
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** Why can you not tell me where I am?
> 
> **Rose:** Because that would be classified, I assume you must understand that more than anyone, Mr. President.
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** Do you promise letting me leave after this interrogation?
> 
> **Rose:** You have my word. So you said the last thing you remember was dying, do you remember where and how?
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** I was dying because of a lot of multiple diseases, if i'm not wrong. I was in Monticello, Virginia 
> 
> **Rose:** Can you remember what those multiple diseases were?
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** Uhh... toxemia, uremia, diarrhea, exhaustion, and well, old age.
> 
> **Rose:** Old age?
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** That is correct, ma'am.
> 
> **Rose:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [SEVEN SECONDS LASTING SILENCE][[/span]] Mr. Jefferson, how old do you think you are?
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** I am 83 years old, why?
> 
> **Rose:** Uhh... can someone get Mr. Jefferson a mirror?
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [PAUSE][[/span]]
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [LOG CONTINUES][[/span]]
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** My God! I look so young. What is happening? Who are you people?
> 
> **Rose:** We are the people that are trying to help you. Do you remember falling unconscious at any time?
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** I do... how do you know that?
> 
> **Rose:** What did you see when you fell unconscious?
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** I- uhh... I first saw a blue light, like clear blue. And then... metal everywhere. Please, I need an explanation of what is happening.
> 
> **Rose:** I'm sorry, but that will not be happening. Agent Smith, please return Mr. Jefferson back to his room.
> 
> **SCP-8665-2:** Wait, what?
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #5
> 
> **Date:** 06/20/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. Emily Rose Kessler
> 
> **Interviewee:** SCP-8665-3: "Franklin Delano Roosevelt"
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** SCP-8665-3 was very confused and swore to have seen George Washington and Abraham Lincoln in the hallway. He was told that he was suffering from hallucinations after falling unconscious. (It was that assumed he fell unconscious at some point after the past interviews). He was told that everything would be explained if he cooperated even tho it was not true. But he already had some idea after he saw the symbol that was everywhere in the Facility. He had worked with SCP as a president before.
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Rose:** Hello Mr. Roosevelt, my name is Emily Rose but you can call me Dr. Rose. I will be asking you a few questions and after you cooperate with us, we'll explain everything you've seen so far.
> 
> **SCP-8665-3:** Y-yeah well, how are both George Washington and Abraham Lincoln alive? Was that someone in a costume?
> 
> **Rose:** As I told you, cooperate and everything will be explained... what is the last thing you remember?
> 
> **SCP-8665-3:** I-... I was in the Little White House Historic Site, in Georgia. And then I collapsed and woke up in this site.
> 
> **Rose:** When you fell unconscious what did you see?
> 
> **SCP-8665-3:** Nothi-... wait... I remember now. First, a clear blue light. And then... metal everywhere.
> 
> **Rose:** ...Agent Smith, please return Mr. Roosevelt to his room. We are done with him for now.
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

By this point, it was known what was happening. The presidents fell unconscious at the time they were supposed to be dead and had a dream about the material their respective coins are made of. By the fact that Thomas Jefferson looked so young despite him dying of old age, it was assumed that the presidents reincarnate looking the way they do in the coins yet remembering everything they pre supposedly lived.

Ever since Ethan Grant Jackson said that he tried to destroy SCP-8665 with no success at all due to a shield protecting the coins, the Foundation has tried to break the shield using different types of acids, lava and other corrosive liquids, but that didn't work. Hammers, knives and all kinds of weapons were used to try to break the shield as well, with no success. In Site-19 a scientist asked for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-294 SCP-294] to generate "A cup of SCP-8665 destroyer" but the machine refused to generate it. It showed a text saying "[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-682 SCP-682] was enough". The coins were transported back to Site-76 afterwards. Once there, the Foundation also tried to make other animals touch the coins to see if the US Presidents were summoned. They were not. Not even objects could touch the coins and summon the presidents. Only humans. This was useful information because now it was known that any form and/or kind of material could be extracted from the coins by just using animal paws/feet or objects like tweezers.

The shield protecting the coins is invisible most of the time, it stops being invisible when it is touched by a human or something trying to destroy it. If any other type of object that's not trying to destroy the coins or any other living creature that isn't a human, touches the coins, the shield doesn't appear. This demonstrated that the shield is what makes the unnatural events occur and not the coins themselves.

**Addendum 8665-A:**

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #6
> 
> **Date:** 06/24/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. Emily Rose Kessler
> 
> **Interviewee:** SCP-8665-4: "George Washington"
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** SCP-8665-4 was very agressive and confused at first, so he had to be put under the influence of drugs so he could talk without a problem.
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Rose:** Hello Mr. Washington, my name is Emily Rose but you can call me Dr. Rose. I will be asking you a few questions and you'll be able to leave after you answer them. Is that OK?
> 
> **SCP-8665-4:** Uhh yes, that would be quite perfect.
> 
> **Rose:** All right then. What is the last thing you remember?
> 
> **SCP-8665-4:** I was... at home. In Virginia. It was almost Christmas.
> 
> **Rose:** Which city in Virginia?
> 
> **SCP-8665-4:** Mount Vernon
> 
> **Rose:** What happened there?
> 
> **SCP-8665-4:** I... passed away.
> 
> **Rose:** Just so you know, you are not in Heaven. I just want you to tell me if before your supposed death you saw anything weird or out of place?
> 
> **SCP-8665-4:** What? No! I am not crazy.
> 
> **Rose:** Be calm, Mr. Washington. Are you sure you didn't see anything out of place at the moment of your supposed death?
> 
> **SCP-8665-4:** Not that I remember.
> 
> **Rose:** All right, how old are you?
> 
> **SCP-8665-4:** I am... 67 years old.
> 
> **Rose:** Huh... well, then I think we're done for now. Agent Grayson, please return Mr. Washington back to his room.
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

Washington did not look 67 years old. He looked 40 at most.

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #7
> 
> **Date:** 06/24/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. Emily Rose Kessler
> 
> **Interviewee:** SCP-8665-5: "John Fitzgerald Kennedy"
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** Just like with SCP-8665-3, SCP-8665-5 already knew about the SCP Foundation. So he was more willing to cooperate than any other anomaly summoned by SCP-8665 that had been interrogated before.
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Rose:** Hello Mr. Kennedy. My name is Emily Rose but you can call me Dr. Rose. I will be asking you a few questions if you don't mind.
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** I do not mind, ma'am.
> 
> **Rose:** Perfect. What is the last thing you remember?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** Before I was brought here, I was in Dealy Plaza. In Dallas, Texas.
> 
> **Rose:** Did you see anything out of place there? Maybe a creature of some type?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** Not that I can remember.
> 
> **Rose:** Did you see any man with a gun?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** I-... wait... I died
> 
> **Rose:** It's a lot more complicated than that. Are you sure you don't remember any type of weird thing or creature?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** I-... I did. Just, not there.
> 
> **Rose:** Wait, what-? I mean... When did you see this anomaly and can you describe it?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** ...I have a confession, and I would appreciate if this confession remained private.
> 
> **Rose:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [CONFUSED][[/span]] ...I promise you that this confession is never going to be revealed. Now, please tell me what happened.
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** I managed to become president by making a deal with Death.
> 
> **Rose:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [FOUR SECONDS LONG SILENCE][[/span]] ...Uhh... Th- the Grim Reaper?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** No. Death does not look like the Grim Reaper. It looks a lot more terrifying than that. And very different.
> 
> **Rose:** B- but you are Catholic. This makes no sense.
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [HIGHLY AGRESSIVE TONE][[/span]] I know! [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [THREE SECONDS LONG SILENCE][[/span]] I- I know, i'm sorry. But I know. I asked Death for success in life and he told me that he'd give it to me only if when I reach success not only my soul is his, but also the souls of those who managed the same success as me.
> 
> **Rose:** So is it like the Devil?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** It's like every demonic or evil being in every mythology merged into one being.
> 
> **Rose:** ...Are you aware of who it meant by "those who managed the same success as me"?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** Probably the US Presidents stuck in the coins.
> 
> **Rose:** ...You know about the coins...
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** Correct.
> 
> **Rose:** Can you describe the appearance of this "Death" more specifically?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** I remember well how it looked but my mouth can't describe it's appearance. It was terrifying.
> 
> **Rose:** Is that all you can tell us?
> 
> **SCP-8665-5:** Yes.
> 
> **Rose:** Agent Grayson, please take Mr. Kennedy to the special room we made for him.
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

**Addendum 8665-B:**

Material from SCP-8665 was extracted. (The coins surface, to be more specific). It was managed to be extracted without activating the shield, using animal paws/feet and tweezers. The material found was put under a microscope and [https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dark_matter dark matter] was found. (The material that molds the universe). This proves that the shield is somehow connected to the power source of the universe.

**Evidence:**

[[include component:image-block
|name=https://i.imgur.com/KBbrrGX.jpg
|caption=Microscopic view of SCP-8665
|width=100%
|align=center]]

**Addendum 8665-C:**

SCP-8665 was moved to Site-02 for research purposes. While the anomaly was there, [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-106 SCP-106] moved. This made the facility activate the emergency protocol. Someone took advantage of the situation and made [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-106 SCP-106] touch the Half-Dollar coin to see if anything happened. The shield's light turned into a extremely shiny red clear light while the coin was floating in the air. It illuminated the whole place, and when the light disappeared, the facility had a blackout and multiple SCP's were released by consequence. After this disaster was controlled, Site-76 took back SCP-8665.

**Addendum 8665-D:** The US presidents have been moved to identical replicas of the White House to contain them there.

**Addendum 8665-E:** In June 30 of 2024 Rebecca Aldridge Winslow was found dead in the outdoors of Pearl Hotel in South Walton, Florida. There was a note next to her.

**Evidence:**

[[include :scp-wiki:component:pages
| medium=plain
| contents=Rebecca Aldridge Winslow is nothing but my latest name. I am who you know as "Death", and the coins have been released due to Ethan Grant Jackson's actions. Your foundation is doomed for disresepcting me.
]]

**Addendum 8665-F:** The Foundation searched for any government data or files on Rebecca Aldridge Winslow, and as expected, the only thing that proves her existence is the house in Florida she supposedly owns, and her name on the Pearl Hotel guest list of June 16 2024, other than that, there has never been any data on Rebecca Aldridge Winslow.

**Addendum 8665-G:**

> **Interrogation Log:** SCP-8665 #7
> 
> **Date:** 07/01/24
> 
> **Interviewer:** Dr. Emily Rose Kessler
> 
> **Interviewee:** Ethan Grant Jackson
> 
> **Interrogation Note:** Jackson was taken to the facility by force this time.
> -----
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [BEGIN LOG][[/span]]
> 
> **Rose:** Hello Mr. Jackson. You know why you're here. But we don't. Which is why I will need you to talk so we can know what is going on. Please explain this. [[span style="color:green"]]//// [ROSE HANDS JACKSON THE NOTE FOUND NEXT TO ALDRIDGE'S BODY][[/span]]
> 
> **Jackson:** W-what are you talking about? Why am I here?
> 
> **Rose:** Right, the amnesia pills.
> 
> **Jackson:** What?
> 
> **Rose:** Uhh, so, do you know about some coins or do you recall bargaining with someone who you shouldn't have? Something unnatural, maybe.
> 
> **Jackson:** ...I made a mistake.
> 
> **Rose:** What kind of mistake?
> 
> **Jackson:** I made a deal with someone who I shouldn't have.
> 
> **Rose:** Death?
> 
> **Jackson:** Y- yes...
> 
> **Rose:** What did he offer?
> 
> **Jackson:** Wealth... well, money, he just didn't specify what type of money.
> 
> **Rose:** What did you offer him in exchange?
> 
> **Jackson:** My soul.
> 
> **Rose:** ...He tricked you. You thought he offered you a life-changing amount of money but he was offering you unnatural coins. That's why you were trying to destroy them, not because they "scared you". Am I wrong?
> 
> **Jackson:** Yes... you are wrong about something. You implied I wasn't scared. And I was fucking terrified.
> 
> **Rose:** [[span style="color:blue"]]//// [SIGH][[/span]] Well, this solves the mystery. Agent Lockwood, please escort Mr. Jackson to Secure Room 17.
> 
> [[span style="color:red"]]//// [END LOG][[/span]]

-----

[[footnoteblock]]
[[footnote]] The Foundation has tried to summon the entity described as "Death", but there is no apparent success.
[[/footnote]]
[[footnote]] The red-shield effect that ocurred in Site-19 was attempted to be re-created yet there hasn't been any success either. A hypothesis on why it happened was still made. It is believed to have happened due to an object that can corrode every type of matter, having contact with an object that is made of an entirely different type of matter. Dark matter. Just like when two opposite magnets have contact, except for the fact that the reaction in this case was a lot more agressive.
[[/footnote]]
[[footnote]] "Death" is theorized to be a being that can somehow warp reality. This considering the fact that the coins contain the very type of matter that shapes the universe.
[[/footnote]]
[[footnote]] It is not only believed that dark matter is what makes the shield unbreakable, but also that dark matter is what causes the anomaly in general. The dark matter found in the coins is believed to be sediments of the shield.
[[/footnote]]
[[footnote]] The note found next to Aldridge's body contained dark matter as well.
[[/footnote]]
[[footnote]] "Death" might be a cosmic being rather than a mystic one. The dark matter found in the coins and in the note is what fundaments this theory.
[[/footnote]]
[[footnote]] It is unsure if this "Death" has any correlation with the "Death" that [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1440 SCP-1440] has described whatsoever. [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1440 SCP-1440] was asked how "Death" looked and he described three different persons that tricked him. But SCP-8665-5 described a horrifying creature that appears to be every evil mythological character merged into one being.
[[/footnote]]

[[/collapsible]]
author: WinterPines
